title: suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for 0utdoors, Ultrasonic Snake Repeller Outdoor, Snake Repellent for Yard Powerful, Snake Away Scare for Outdoors Lawn Garden and Yard
descriptions:
Hello and welcome dear customer. Today we want to introduce to you our very good product for keeping your garden safe from snakes and other animals. This is our 'suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for Outdoors'. 

Our snake repellent uses technology of Ultrasonic. It sends out sound every 30 seconds that snakes and other animals do not like. This sound covers a big area, up to 7000 square feet. We make sure to use very strong and good quality materials so it lasts long time, even in bad weather because it has IP44 waterproof rating.

Also, very important, it is safe for your children and your pets because it does not use any chemicals. It is very good for environment too. This product can work against many animals like deers, cats, rabbits, dogs, raccoons, skunks, rats, mice, armadillos, wild pigs, bears, foxes, and squirrels. It usually starts to work in 2 to 4 weeks' time.

Our snake repellent is very easy to use. It gets power from the sun, so no need for batteries or electricity. Before first time you use, please let it charge in sun for 4 to 5 hours. When you install, put it 2 inches above the soil.

We hope you like our suphanlin snake repellent. It is good choice for keep your place safe and peaceful. Thank you for considering our product.

Hello and good day. I share with you our product, the suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for Outdoors. This is for making snakes go away from your place.

This product work with ultrasonic technology. It make sound every 30 seconds that snakes not like, but humans cannot hear. It can cover big area, up to 7000 ft². Made with good quality material that last long time and also it work with solar energy, no need for batteries. It have IP44 waterproof rating, so rain is okay.

This snake repellent also safe for children and pets, no chemicals inside. Not just snakes, but also make other animals like deers, cats, rabbits, and many more to stay away. It start to work good in 2 to 4 weeks time. 

Before you use, please charge it in sun for 4-5 hours. You put it in ground with 2 inches above the soil. It make your garden or farm without snakes and some other animals. Thank you for considering our product for safe and easy animal control.

Hello, we want to tell you about a product we make, it is called "suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for Outdoors". This product is for keep snakes away from your place. It use sound that humans not hear to make the snakes go away. The sound is called Ultrasonic. It makes the sound every 30 seconds.

The product can cover a big space, up to 7000 ft². We make it from very good materials, and it is strong for use many time. It gets its power from the sun, so you do not need batteries or electricity. This is very good for saving money and good for Earth. The product is also waterproof with a rating IP44, so you can leave it outside when it rains.

It is safe for your children and your pets because it does not have chemicals. Also, not just snakes, but it can keep away many animals like deers, cats, rabbits, dogs, raccoons, and more.

Before you use it first time, you need to let it get power from the sun for 4 to 5 hours. You put it in the ground 2 inches up from the soil. After you start using it, it will work better after 2 to 4 weeks.

We hope you think about buying our "suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for Outdoors". It is a good choice for keeping your home safe from snakes and other animals. Thank you.
